jobDescription: BI Data AnalystResponsibilities:Analysis of database tables as they relate to a data warehouse modelAssure the quality and consistency of data stored in the database and suggest recommendations for data cleansing based upon business rulesPrepare Data Quality and Schema Structure reportsCreate mappings between the fields in the source and target systems as well as identifying relationships within a sourceLeverage mappings to create an ETL process to move the data from the source system to the target system.Performance tuning of queries and tablesOptimize and create stored proceduresRequirements:3 - 4 years’ experience working in a data migration/analysis roleStrong with MSSQLExperience with dashboards and creating reportsFamiliarity with database and data warehousing conceptsStrong SQL and Database skillsAbility to rapidly understand business requirements, communicate business expectations to cross-functional development teams, document analysis findings that can be easily understoodExperience with data quality assessment, cleansing, and improvement effortsData sourcing, data mapping, data profiling, data mining, documenting data definitionsBS or equivalent work experience
